author: MENAFN
title: Amit Shah Pays Homage To 'Bravehearts' Of Assam Rifles | MENAFN.COM
text:
( MENAFN - IANS) Shillong, Jan 19 (IANS) Union Home Minister Amit Shah on Friday visited the Headquarters Directorate General of the Assam Rifles in Shillong and paid tributes to the "bravehearts" for their sacrifices.
According to an official statement mentioned, Shah was given a windshield tour of the well laid out garrison located in the city's Laitkor area.
He also laid a wreath at the War Memorial.
In a post on X, the Union Minister said: "The sacrifices made by the Bravehearts of Assam Rifles for the security of our nation are unparalleled. Laid a wreath at the War Memorial at Headquarters Directorate General Assam Rifles and paid homage to the martyrs who laid down their lives in the line of duty."
The Union Minister is visiting Shillong to attend the 71st plenary session of North East Council (NEC).
He also inaugurated the Cyber Security Operations Center at the Headquarters which will provide the Force with a fighting edge to ward off cyber-attacks.
On Saturday, Shah will travel to Assam where he will take part in various welfare programmes
--IANS

author: @infomoscow24
title: Международный книжный клуб для молодежи откроется в Москве
text:
09:47
Город
Международный книжный клуб для молодежи откроется в Москве
Фото: пресс-служба комитета общественных связей и молодежной политики города Москвы
В столице откроется проект "Книжный хаб" от Международного клуба дружбы Москвы для российской и иностранной молодежи, рассказала руководитель проекта "Молодежь Москвы" Маргарита Савинкина.
"Это еще одна платформа для обмена идеями, культурой и опытом между молодежью разных стран. Проект станет местом, которое будет объединять молодых ребят и подчеркнет важность культурного обмена в современном мире", – цитирует ее портал мэра и правительства Москвы.
В проекте смогут принять участие как российские, так и иностранные студенты от 18 до 35 лет. Для этого нужно подать заявку на портале. Сами встречи смогут проходить каждый месяц в пространстве "Молодежи Москвы".
"Идея создания "Книжного хаба" пришла к нам после проведения литературного вечера. Заметили неподдельный интерес молодежи к чтению", – указал лидер Международного клуба дружбы Москвы Егор Стативка.
Клуб нужен не только для повышения интереса к книгам, но и для укрепления дружбы между различными молодежными сообществами разных государств. Участники клуба смогут выбирать новую книгу известных писателей из разных стран, а затем обсуждать произведения в креативных форматах – от стендапов до театральных постановок, изложений и даже рисования.
Международный клуб дружбы проводит и другие мероприятия – от кулинарных мастер-классов до разговорных клубов. Благодаря этому молодежь из других стран получает возможность узнать культуру народов РФ поближе, изучить особенности национальной кухни и поделиться своими традициями и обычаями.
Участникам также проводят экскурсии по городу, а студенты из Китая, Турции, Молдовы и других стран совместно с молодежью Москвы регулярно навещают приюты для бездомных животных.
В текущем месяце также ожидается празднование Дня молодежи, рассказывал ранее Сергей Собянин. Оно состоится 28 и 29 июня на Болотной площади. В этот раз программа мероприятия будет посвящена карьере, креативу, спорту, а также личностному развитию, волонтерскому движение и патриотизму. Кроме того, пройдут акустический концерт и летний Кубок молодежи Москвы по КВН.

author: megan-james
title: Letter to the editor: Election help needed in Pennsylvania - Addison Independent
text:
Letter to the editor: Election help needed in Pennsylvania Oct 24, 2024 | Op/Ed
Op/Ed Letter to the editor: Election help needed in Pennsylvania October 24, 2024 By Lise Anderson Voter turnout in the Philadelphia area is crucial to winning Pennsylvania for Democrats and for preserving democracy. Swing Blue Alliance Pennsylvania needs more boots on the ground right now. So, this week, if you want to make a difference, consider traveling to Philadelphia.
Last week Abi Sessions, Carolyn Craven and I went from Middlebury to Bucks County, Pa., to help Swing Blue Alliance register voters, inform voters about early voting locations, and canvas for local Democrats up and down the ballot. One day we took the train into South Philly and told passersby about the city’s new satellite polling stations. It was very rewarding!
There were volunteers from Massachusetts and Vermont, folks from California and as far away as Wales, UK, but they need more folks to come.
Don’t wait for election day. Early voting is happening now. You can have a travel adventure and make a difference (it’s a pretty 6–7-hour drive)! Sign up for at least three days; they prefer five+ to perfect your skills. (We found that to be true.) Organizers can help arrange your housing, or you can stay with supportive old friends, like we did.
Your presence can make a big difference in the outcome in Pennsylvania. As David Plouffe, Obama’s former campaign director says, “more than at any other time in any campaign: doors matter!”
Use one of these links to sign up:
Philadelphia or Bucks County
Lise Anderson
Cornwall

author: VNExplorer
title: Volvo, prodotta l'ultima auto diesel
text:
Il gigante automobilistico svedese Volvo ha fatto un passo significativo nel suo impegno verso la sostenibilità ambientale, confermando quanto annunciato lo scorso anno in merito allo stop della produzione di veicoli a gasolio, prevista per il 2024. Questa decisione è stata sancita con la produzione dell’ultima V60 Cross Country diesel, prodotta nello stabilimento di Gand, in Belgio.
L’ultima V60 Cross Country Questo annuncio rappresenta una mossa decisa verso la transizione verso veicoli a propulsione più ecologica e riflette l’impegno di Volvo verso “la riduzione delle emissioni nocive e il progresso verso un futuro più sostenibile”, come spiegato dal brand. La V60 Cross Country, un’icona nel settore delle station wagon, ha rappresentato un pilastro della gamma di prodotti Volvo per molti anni. Con la sua versatilità e l’indole fuoristradistica, ha guadagnato un seguito fedele di clienti in tutto il mondo. Tuttavia, con i cambiamenti nel panorama automobilistico e l’accento crescente sull’elettrificazione, Volvo ha ritenuto opportuno concludere la produzione di vetture diesel (che hanno da sempre caratterizzato buona parte delle immatricolazioni del brand).
volvo
Lo stabilimento di Gand, dove è stata assemblata l’ultima V60 Cross Country diesel, è stato uno dei punti focali della produzione di Volvo in Europa. La decisione di concludere la produzione di auto diesel in questa sede segna una trasformazione significativa nella strategia produttiva dell’azienda e sottolinea il suo impegno verso tecnologie più pulite e sostenibili. Il percorso è stato avviato già nel 2021, quando in concomitanza con la strategia promossa dal colosso cinese Geely, il brand si è impegnato a riorganizzare stabilimenti, risorse e investimenti per la fatidica soglia del 2030, anno dal quale intende promuovere un’offerta 100% elettrica.
Volvo
L’elettrico è la strada? È importante notare che Volvo ha già fatto passi significativi nell’elettrificazione della propria gamma di veicoli, con l’introduzione di modelli ibridi plug-in e completamente elettrici, non ultimo la celebre Volvo EX30. La decisione di interrompere la produzione di auto diesel è coerente con la visione dell’azienda di diventare completamente neutrale dal punto di vista climatico entro il 2040. Questo annuncio potrebbe anche avere impatti significativi sull’industria automobilistica nel suo complesso, spingendo altri produttori a riconsiderare le loro strategie di produzione e ad accelerare l’adozione di tecnologie più pulite. Una direzione però non condivisa da tutti. C’è chi ipotizza un cambio di rotta entro il 2026, anno in cui si deciderà in via definitiva in vista della fatidica data del 2035 per l’Europa: molti costruttori hanno già “tirato i remi in barca” su molti aspetti, rallentando la produzione di auto elettriche e, addirittura, cancellando o rimandando diverse decine di modelli.

author: Stephanie Southey
title: Casa Maria's owner charged with arson requests change of venue
text:
COLUMBIA − The attorney for a Columbia woman charged with arson in Dunklin County filed a motion for a change of venue Wednesday.
Crystal Umfress, who owns Casa Maria's Mexican Cantina in Columbia, faces a second-degree arson charge in connection to a July 10 fire at Lupita's Mexican Restaurant in Kennett.
According to court documents, a witness claimed Umfress paid her nearly $1,500 to burn down the restaurant. The witness and a second defendant, Kerry Raymond, allegedly went to the restaurant, where Raymond allegedly ignited the fire by using a gasoline container and alcohol.
Surveillance footage from the restaurant captured the ignition:
Video shared by the Kennett Fire Department shows a suspect enter a backdoor to Lupita's Mexican Restaurant in Kennett, Missouri, on July 10, 2023. A Columbia woman is charged with arson in connection to the fire.

author: Emilioekpt
title: The Ultimate Guide to English Payment Integration Solutions
text:
In the evolving business environment, an efficient payment integration solution is more than a mere necessity. It's the bridge that connects businesses to their customers, facilitating seamless transactions. Today, we delve into the world of English payment integration solutions, illuminating how they foster business growth, improve customer experiences, and promote overall transactional efficiency.
2. Understanding Payment Integration
Payment integration is the process of incorporating a payment gateway into a business’s digital platform, be it a website, online store, or mobile app. This integration allows businesses to receive payments directly from customers, paving the way for a smoother, more streamlined e-commerce experience.
3. Why Payment Integration is Crucial for Your Business
In the digital age, having a reliable payment integration solution can be the difference between success and failure. It enhances customer satisfaction by providing a swift, secure, and efficient payment process. Moreover, it reduces the risk of cart abandonment, boosts sales, and contributes significantly to business growth.
4. Key Features of an Excellent Payment Integration Solution
A superior payment integration solution should offer:
• Security: To protect sensitive information from cyber threats.
• Compatibility: It should easily integrate with your website or app.
• Multiple Payment Options: To accommodate customer preferences.
• Speed: For quick and efficient transactions.
• Reliable Customer Support: For addressing any technical issues or queries.
5. Top English Payment Integration Solutions
English payment integration solutions have seen rapid advancements in recent years, with several providers offering diverse capabilities. Below, we explore some of the most effective options.
5.1. PayPal
A global leader, PayPal offers a robust payment integration solution with multi-currency support, making it ideal for businesses looking to reach international customers. It provides an intuitive interface, exceptional security measures, and excellent customer support.
5.2. Stripe
Stripe has gained popularity due to its comprehensive API, allowing businesses to customize their payment process extensively. It supports a wide array of payment options and currencies, promoting a seamless customer experience.
5.3. Worldpay
A major player in the UK, Worldpay caters to businesses of all sizes. It's lauded for its robust fraud detection capabilities, diverse payment options, and competitive rates.
6. Advantages of English Payment Integration Solutions
These solutions offer numerous benefits, including:
• Increased Sales: By offering a smooth, seamless payment process, businesses can significantly boost their conversion rates.
• Enhanced Security: Top-tier solutions come with state-of-the-art security measures, ensuring safe transactions.
• Better User Experience: A streamlined payment process improves the overall customer journey, encouraging repeat business.
7. How to Integrate a Payment Gateway
Integrating a payment gateway into your platform typically involves the following steps:
1. Choose a Payment Gateway: Consider your business requirements, customer preferences, and budget.
2. Create a Merchant Account: This account allows you to accept payments.
3. Integration: Use the API or SDK provided by the gateway provider to integrate the payment solution into your platform.
8. Potential Challenges in Payment Integration
While integrating a payment solution, you may face challenges related to security, compatibility, transaction failures, and hidden fees. It's crucial to conduct thorough research, compare various providers, and seek expert advice to avoid potential pitfalls.
9. Future of Payment Integration Solutions
With emerging technologies like AI and blockchain, the future of payment integration solutions looks promising. These technologies can enhance security, speed, and efficiency, fundamentally changing how businesses process payments.
10. Conclusion
English payment integration solutions have revolutionized the business landscape, enabling companies to provide swift, secure, and efficient transaction experiences. By understanding the importance of these solutions, their features, advantages, and potential challenges, businesses can make informed decisions, driving growth and customer satisfaction. The future holds exciting possibilities for payment integration, making it an essential aspect for any business aspiring to thrive in the digital era.
